Clean gradebook

Source: R/clean_gradebook.R
clean_gradebook.Rd

Given selected columns converts NA to 0 and EX to NA.

Usage

clean_gradebook(gb, cols)

Arguments

gb

gradebook tibble

cols

cols to clean

Value

cleaned gradebook

Examples

clean_gradebook(gradebook, A1:A3)
#> # A tibble: 10 × 4
#>    id          A1    A2    A3
#>    <chr>    <dbl> <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 a9164528    29    19    80
#>  2 a3162258    84    27    72
#>  3 a5333482    18     0    87
#>  4 a2959297    44    33    88
#>  5 a2554189    96    67    12
#>  6 a3974964    26   100    50
#>  7 a9186486    37    14    20
#>  8 a8613711    NA    58    17
#>  9 a4651341    81     0    43
#> 10 a8554513    32    32    27
